summary: This mod make Leather Armor less bulky, less fuzzy, and extra comfy.
descriptionHtml:
All this mod does is remove the intrusive shoulder pads and the horrible fuzzies that line the edges.  Leather Armor always made me feel uncomfortable because it looked bulky and itchy.  This is my first time using nifskope, so it\'s nothing too advanced.  ~__~

Also, I didn\'t change any of the textures because they look fine, I think.

I hope you enjoy!  :)

My other armor mods:
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5989]Cute and Colorful Armor[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5921]Hello Kitty Armor[/url]
author: IcePenguin
